M

main(String[]) - Static method in class BitTorrent.RUBTClient
Main method
makeList(List<Peer>, bitFieldDS[]) - Method in class BitTorrent.Control
Makes a subset list based on the rarest pieces first.
makeThreads() - Method in class BitTorrent.Control
For every peer in the list of peers we want to connect to, send an interested message stop the keep alive messages and start the thread.
Message - Class in BitTorrent
This class represents message types sent between two peers through a stream of bytes.
Message(int, byte) - Constructor for class BitTorrent.Message
 
message - Variable in class BitTorrent.Message
The byte array that stores the message to send to peer.
MSG_BITFIELD - Static variable in class BitTorrent.Message
The message id byte that pertains to bitfield when communicating with peer.
MSG_CHOKE - Static variable in class BitTorrent.Message
The message id byte that pertains to choke when communicating with peer.
MSG_HAVE - Static variable in class BitTorrent.Message
The message id byte that pertains to have when communicating with peer.
MSG_INTERESTED - Static variable in class BitTorrent.Message
The message id byte that pertains to interested when communicating with peer.
MSG_KEEP_ALIVE - Static variable in class BitTorrent.Message
The message id byte that pertains to keep alive when communicating with peer.
MSG_NOT_INTERESTED - Static variable in class BitTorrent.Message
The message id byte that pertains to not interested when communicating with peer.
MSG_PIECE - Static variable in class BitTorrent.Message
The message id byte that pertains to piece when communicating with peer.
MSG_REQUEST - Static variable in class BitTorrent.Message
The message id byte that pertains to request when communicating with peer.
MSG_UNCHOKE - Static variable in class BitTorrent.Message
The message id byte that pertains to unchoke when communicating with peer.
